- Hexo
---

# References
[Hexo Home Page](<https://hexo.io>)
# Create new post

~~~powershell
npx hexo new {PostTitle}
~~~

# Start Hexo server

~~~powershell
npx hexo server
~~~

# Generate static files

~~~powershell
npx hexo generate
~~~

# Remove generated files

~~~powershell
npx hexo clean
~~~

# List all posts

~~~powershell
npx hexo list post
~~~
